name: Eldredth Escape
description:
Eldredth Escape

A platformer which is a sequel to Blast 'Em Up (https://arthurmorganparallax.itch.io/blastemup)

Credits:

Created by: Parrallax Games

Cover Art by Le Boi Tard 

Assets provided by MSU/Coursera

Note: There is a bug where your life doesn't reset but the icons do, will fix it soon
